bibl.title: Menander, qui vitae ostendit vitam.
bibl.note: Slightly amended version of a paper read in Newcastle upon Tyne during the spring of 1967. - Three generative influences on Menander. - The Dyskolos. - A few distinctive hall-marks of Menander's style and dramatic art.
bibl.seg: 364 Menander A Menander C Dyscolus Menander D
Arnott W. Geoffrey, Menander, qui vitae ostendit vitam.

Slightly amended version of a paper read in Newcastle upon Tyne during the spring of 1967. - Three generative influences on Menander. - The Dyskolos. - A few distinctive hall-marks of Menander's style and dramatic art.
